## The development repository for the ahri R library

This is a private repository that contains the R code for the `ahri` library. 

All documentation and help via the wiki pages can be found on the `ahri` public repository: https://github.com/vando026/ahri/wiki. 

Please post any issues on the public repository: https://github.com/vando026/ahri/issues.
